about_the_game:
Milf City is a modern city where many races, cultures and lives of ordinary people are intertwined. And today you will be able to get to know more closely the life of 5 beautiful girls, residents of this city, who are radically different in their lifestyles and characters. Here you will forget about the problems of everyday life and plunge into the exciting world of Milf City!



Features:
➡ 5 girls who will amaze you with their diversity and charisma!
➡ Once you start the game, you will not be able to stop, you will want more and more ...
➡ Mahjong-solitaire, in which you can show your flexibility of mind and receive the desired rewards ...
➡ Every girl has her own Mahjong-solitaire puzzle.
➡ Each girl has her own gallery, with her own unique pictures.



About the characters:
➡ The owner of the beer bar is a sexy American woman who knows everything about brewing real beer and is not averse to having a couple of glasses with you while having a pleasant conversation. Believe me, you won't even blink an eye as she hops you, and then everything depends on you;)
➡ A milf from a traditional Japanese house. The wife of a wealthy businessman who misses a man's embrace, because her husband, as always, is not up to her. Very modest, she greedily absorbs compliments, like the earth on a hot day.
➡ Owner of a grocery supermarket. She loves to work with her hands and take care of plants. He often pays with his employees not with money ...
➡ A real female vamp. Expensive dresses, jewelry, boyfriends - it's all about her. She is very gambling, so she likes to borrow. He finds his victims in the casino, and then the work of hands and no fraud!
➡ Extreme milf, lives in a bungalow, near the sea. She loves freedom, adrenaline and the fresh breeze of adventure. She is indomitable in sex, so you have to try to create a good impression.

If you want to skip mahjong game, press "X" when mahjong game is active

highlighted.name: The first beer in the bar is free
The farm does not tolerate the weak

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains nudity and sexual content. Also game are not suitable for watching at work, not suitable for all ages, all characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT750
  • Storage: 1750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
